name: Gerrit
desc: Web based code review and repository management for the git version control system

options.name: builtinPlugins
options.desc: List of builtins plugins to install. Those are shipped in the gerrit.war file.

options.name: jvmHeapLimit
options.desc: How much memory to allocate to the JVM heap

options.name: jvmOpts
options.desc: A list of JVM options to start gerrit with.

options.name: listenAddress
options.desc: hostname:port to listen for HTTP traffic. This is bound using the systemd socket activation.

options.name: plugins
options.desc: List of plugins to add to Gerrit. Each derivation is a jar file itself where the name of the derivation is the name of plugin.

options.name: replicationSettings
options.desc: Replication configuration. This will be generated to the etc/replication.config file.
options.type: lazy attribute set of lazy attribute set of (string or boolean or signed integer or list of (string or boolean or signed integer) or lazy attribute set of (string or boolean or signed integer or list of (string or boolean or signed integer)))

options.name: serverId
options.desc: Set a UUID that uniquely identifies the server. This can be generated with nix-shell -p util-linux --run uuidgen.

options.name: settings
options.desc: Gerrit configuration. This will be generated to the etc/gerrit.config file.
options.type: lazy attribute set of lazy attribute set of (string or boolean or signed integer or list of (string or boolean or signed integer) or lazy attribute set of (string or boolean or signed integer or list of (string or boolean or signed integer)))
